title.value: Minigrid & Miniworld: Modular & Customizable Reinforcement Learning Environments for Goal-Oriented Tasks
title.justification: This is the title of the paper provided by the user.
title.quote:
Minigrid & Miniworld: Modular & Customizable
Reinforcement Learning Environments for
Goal-Oriented Tasks

extractions.description: The paper presents the Minigrid and Miniworld libraries which provide a suite of goal-oriented 2D and 3D environments designed to facilitate research in reinforcement learning. The libraries are built with a minimalistic design to allow for easy customization and rapid development of new environments. The paper discusses the design philosophy, environment details, and their world generation API and showcases the libraries' capabilities through case studies on transfer learning.

type.justification: The paper includes implementation details, discussions on the design philosophy, environment specifications, and case studies demonstrating the use of the libraries.
type.quote: In our case studies, we have shown the unified API among two libraries provides an easy way to study transfer learning between different observation spaces and human decision-making.

name.justification: The main focus of the paper is on providing environments to facilitate research in reinforcement learning, specifically goal-oriented tasks.
name.quote: The Minigrid and Miniworld libraries provide modular and customizable RL environments for goal-oriented tasks.

name.justification: The paper includes case studies on transfer learning between different observation spaces.
name.quote: In our case studies, we have shown the unified API among two libraries provides an easy way to study transfer learning between different observation spaces and human decision-making.

name.justification: The paper mentions the usage of the libraries in meta-learning and provides examples of research in this area.
name.quote: The two libraries have also been used in developing meta-learning and transfer-learning algorithms.

name.justification: Minigrid is one of the main libraries discussed in the paper for providing goal-oriented 2D environments.
name.quote: We present the Minigrid and Miniworld libraries which provide a suite of goal-oriented 2D and 3D environments.

referenced_paper_title.justification: There is no other referenced paper mentioned for Minigrid.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We present the Minigrid and Miniworld libraries which provide a suite of goal-oriented 2D and 3D environments.

name.justification: Miniworld is another main library discussed in the paper for providing goal-oriented 3D environments.
